data.system_settings: iPhone XS Max, iOS 12.2 Dev Beta 5
data.expected_result: Button is not inside safe area
data.short_description: [iPhone X/XR/XS/XS Max] 'Need Help?' button when account requires verification is inside safe area
data.steps_to_repro: - Create and log into a new account which requires verification, to ensure that the verification required screen appears - Observe the 'Need Help?' button at the bottom
